name.ja: <ruby>原<rt>げん</rt></ruby><ruby>初<rt>しょ</rt></ruby>の<ruby>一<rt>ひと</rt></ruby><ruby>振<rt>ふ</rt></ruby>り

requirement.en: When an opponent's monster declares an attack, pay 400 LP.

effect.en: The attacking monster loses 700 ATK until the end of this turn. Then, if you have a face-up Legend Normal Monster on your field, you can destroy 1 monster on your opponent's field.
